definitions.text: a seat for one person, with a support for the back
examples: he put his coat over the back of the chair and sat down
he was awarded an endowed chair in economics

definitions.text: the officer who presides at the meetings of an organization
examples: address your remarks to the chairperson

definitions.text: an instrument of execution by electrocution; resembles an ordinary seat for one person
examples: the murderer was sentenced to die in the chair

definitions.text: a particular seat in an orchestra
act or preside as chair, as of an academic department in a university
examples: She chaired the department for many years
